tags.name: register
tags.description: All API required to Register in Dimensy.

tags.name: sign
tags.description: All API signature placement processes for Dimensy. There are 3 types of signature placement: Single, Serial, and Parallel. The APIs are listed in the correct order. Please follow carefully.

tags.name: stamp
tags.description: All API stamp placement processes for Dimensy. The APIs are listed in the correct order. Please follow carefully.

tags.name: meterai
tags.description: All API e-meterai placement processes for Dimensy. The APIs are listed in the correct order. Please follow carefully.

tags.name: keyla
tags.description: All APIs regarding KEYLA information and activation.

tags.name: renewalCA
tags.description: All APIs required to renew Certificate Authority (CA).

tags.name: commonProcess
tags.description: A collection of API utilities to improve user convenience.

post.description: The registration process for new users on Dimensy.

value.message: Registration Successful! Please check your email for activation process.

post.description: The verification process for newly registered users on Dimensy. Note that videos will be sent in base64 format without MIME and the system can only accept video formats with H.264 and WEBM codecs.

base64video.description: Video in base64 format. The system can only accept video formats with H.264 and WEBM codecs.

post.description: Initiate the Signing process by submitting documents and signature information.
Submit the authentication data required to complete document signing. To run this API, The OTP API needs to be executed first.
Initiate the Serial Signing process by submitting documents and signers information.
Set the sign coordinates for serial signing in Dimensy.
Submit the authentication data required to complete document signing. To run this API, The OTP API needs to be executed first.
Initiate the Paralel Signing process by submitting documents and signers information.
Set the sign coordinates for paralel signing in Dimensy.
Submit the authentication data required to complete document signing. To run this API, The OTP API needs to be executed first.
Initiate the Stamping process by submitting documents and stamp information.
Submit the authentication data required to complete document stamping. To run this API, The OTP API needs to be executed first.

get.description: Check if the user is registered in the KEYLA system.
Register the active user in the KEYLA system.

post.description: Verification process to renew your CA in Dimensy.

get.description: Get document-type information. This type of document is mandatory for the Meterai Placement Process.

post.description: Implementation of e-Meterai placement by sending documents and e-Meterai position. Unlike the Signing and Stamping process, this process does not require OTP authentication. So, your e-Stamp will be automatically placed upon successful execution of this API.

get.description:
Generate an OTP code and send it to your email and SMS. After OTP, user can execute one of the signing process below in accordance to the ongoing process:
  • Single Signing
  • Serial Signing
  • Paralel Signing
  • Stamping
Download your finished document. A document can be downloaded if the status is "COMPLETED", "STAMP", or "SEALED"
Receive document information related to the user. Each document has a status depending on the process of signing, stamping, or e-Meterai.
This API will display the package, its details, and the remaining quotas of your company. There are 8 types of quota: User, Upload, Storage, Sign, Stamp, Materai, OTP, and Keyla

data.nama: Dokumen pernyataan jumlah uang lebih dari 5jt

detail.description: Package details consist of the quota

Token.description: Consist of token data required for OTP Process

token.description: Automatically generated code to authenticate the signing process

OTP.description: The OTP Model required for authentication process.

otpCode.description: The OTP code required for authentication

tokenCode.description: The token code acquired from Get OTP API Response

filename.description: File input name. It is recommended to include the file extension.

base64Doc.description: The base64 format of the document.

Signer.description: Contains the coordinates of your document's Signature, e-Meterai, or Stamp element.

page.description: The page location of the signature.

location.description: Location of the city where the signature, e-Meterai or stamp is placed.

id.description: Document type ID. This ID is required for the Meterai Placement API.

apiKeyParam.name: apiKey
apiKeyParam.description: API key generated from the dashboard. Each company has a unique API Key. Please don't use other company's API Key as it will cause process failure.

emailParam.name: email
emailParam.description: Use the email associated with your account.

noDoc.description: Document number. Defined by document content

docType.description: Document type ID acquired from Document Type API

dob.description: Date of Birth. Please use the YYYY-MM-DD format

password.description: New user's password. A password must have at least one digit number, one digit uppercase and contain at least this !@#$%^&* character.

fotoKtp.description: Picture of the new user's KTP/ID card

fotoNpwp.description: Picture of the new user's NPWP card

filename.description: File input name. It is recommended to include the file extension.

base64Doc.description: The base64 format of the document.

reason.description: The user's needs by stamping this document

data.description: List of all available documents related to your account
List of all available document types

isExpired.description: Information on your CA validity period

qrCode.description: Received QR Code in base64 format
